amendment.description: An amendment numbered 7 printed in Part B of House Report 116-2 to clarify that winegrape growers whose crops were tainted by smoke from a 2018 wildfire are eligible for assistance under this Act, even if the damage is discovered after the grapes have been removed from the vine.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Thompson (CA) amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Thompson (CA) amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A007) offered by Mr. Thompson (CA).
